original_text: In the multitude of people is the king's honour: but in the want of people is the destruction of the prince.
korean_text: 백성이 많은 것은 왕의 영광이요 백성이 적은 것은 주권자의 패망이니라

sentences.original_text: In multitude of people is the king's honour:
sentences.korean_translation: 백성이 많은 가운데 왕의 영광이 있고

sentences.original_text: but in want of people is the destruction of the prince.
sentences.korean_translation: 백성이 부족한 가운데 방백의 멸망이 있느니라
